languages.text: Вольный Торговец поручил{mf||а} блюстителям поиски преступника. Необходимо дождаться доклада Мастера дисциплины.
The Rogue Trader has tasked {mf|his|her} enforcers with finding the culprit. All {mf|he|she} has to do now is wait for a report from the Master-at-Arms.
languages.original_text: Вольный Торговец поручил{mf||а} блюстителям поиски преступника. Необходимо дождаться доклада Мастера дисциплины.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader has tasked {mf|his|her} enforcers with finding the culprit. All {mf|he|she} has to do now is wait for a report from the Master-at-Arms.

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a chargé ses prévôts de trouver le coupable. Il lui suffit désormais d'attendre le rapport de la capitaine d'armes.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has tasked {mf|his|her} enforcers with finding the culprit. All {mf|he|she} has to do now is wait for a report from the Master-at-Arms.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a chargé ses prévôts de trouver le coupable. Il lui suffit désormais d'attendre le rapport de la capitaine d'armes.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ha encomendado al personal de seguridad la búsqueda del culpable. Solo le queda esperar el informe de la maestra de armas.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has tasked {mf|his|her} enforcers with finding the culprit. All {mf|he|she} has to do now is wait for a report from the Master-at-Arms.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ha encomendado al personal de seguridad la búsqueda del culpable. Solo le queda esperar el informe de la maestra de armas.

languages.text: 行商浪人已经派出了执法者追捕罪魁祸首。现在要做的事情，就是等待戒律大师的报告。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has tasked {mf|his|her} enforcers with finding the culprit. All {mf|he|she} has to do now is wait for a report from the Master-at-Arms.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人已经派出了执法者追捕罪魁祸首。现在要做的事情，就是等待戒律大师的报告。

languages.text: ローグトレーダーは自身のエンフォーサーに、犯人を捜すよう課題を出した。今ローグトレーダーがすることは、マスター・アット・アームズの報告を待つだけだ。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has tasked {mf|his|her} enforcers with finding the culprit. All {mf|he|she} has to do now is wait for a report from the Master-at-Arms.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーは自身のエンフォーサーに、犯人を捜すよう課題を出した。今ローグトレーダーがすることは、マスター・アット・アームズの報告を待つだけだ。

languages.text: D{mf|er Freihändler|ie Freihändlerin} hat {mf|seinen|ihren} Enforcers befohlen, den Täter zu finden. Nun muss {mf|er|sie} nur noch auf einen Bericht der Master-at-Arms warten.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has tasked {mf|his|her} enforcers with finding the culprit. All {mf|he|she} has to do now is wait for a report from the Master-at-Arms.

traits.locale_text: D{mf|er Freihändler|ie Freihändlerin} hat {mf|seinen|ihren} Enforcers befohlen, den Täter zu finden. Nun muss {mf|er|sie} nur noch auf einen Bericht der Master-at-Arms warten.

languages.text: Hür Tacir, infazcılarını suçluyu bulmakla görevlendirdi. Artık tek yapması gereken, Silahtar'tan gelecek raporu beklemek.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has tasked {mf|his|her} enforcers with finding the culprit. All {mf|he|she} has to do now is wait for a report from the Master-at-Arms.
